int search(void* a, size_t size, void* target, 
	size_t elem_size, int(*cmpFn)(void*, void*) )
{
	for(int i=0; i<size; i++) {
		if ( cmpFn (a + elem_size * i, target) == 0 ) {
			return i;
		}
	}
	return -1;
}

{

	}
	return NULL;
}
